title: Drawing, "Project for ciboria", 1915
signed: Signature inscibed, impressed: GEORGE.E.GERMER.DES [separated by vertically-centered dots rather than dots at the baseline]
inscribed: Written in the bottom margin: A; 6 3/16 high; (Con483)
description: In Gothic shape. Wreath around the knob. Spherical cover, topped by a mound. Reverse stamped: The Society of Arts and Crafts, 8 Park Street, Boston, reserves the exclusive right / to estimate on this design.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Project for ciboria", 1915.Pencil, light blue watercolor. 1939-84-45-a.
